content.rendered:
Invisalign®

Invisalign® Gardena, CA

If you are embarrassed about crooked teeth, the Invisalign® system is popular and practical. For around the same price as traditional braces, Invisalign® clear braces can produce excellent outcomes, often with shorter overall treatment duration. Most people won’t realize you’re using Invisalign® as they are barely noticeable. A quick consultation with our dentist will give you more detailed information on this convenient orthodontic treatment.

What is the Invisalign® Process?

Your customized treatment plan is created using 3D computer graphics, and your new aligners will fit tightly over your teeth. Each aligner is meticulously measured and made just for you. Depending on the degree of correction required, sessions are scheduled every eight to ten weeks and only last about 15 to 30 minutes. The cost of Invisalign® is equivalent to that of traditional braces, and it is typically covered to the same extent by orthodontic insurance as traditional orthodontics.

What is Invisalign®?

Invisalign® aligners are made of a clear, thin, medical-grade polymer. The aligners gradually move your teeth little by little and are virtually invisible when worn. Simply remove the aligners when you eat, floss and brush your teeth. At the end of your treatment, your teeth will be beautifully aligned.

Our orthodontists routinely use the Invisalign® treatment for:

  • Crooked or crowded teeth
  • Improperly spaced teeth
  • Bite Issues (underbite, overbite, crossbite, open bite)
Book Your Appointment Now
